featured.text: Their names are Tag, Notch, and Baby.
Whale experts found Tag, Notch, Baby alive.
The three whales Tag, Notch, and Baby were rescued because (A) younger whales have a greater chance of survival than the others.
It came with a high price tag and tea was taxed as well.
After their release, Tag, Notch, and Baby were never seen again.

definition.zh_def: 標籤；標記，用於識別或分類物品的詞或短語。
definition.en_def: A label or marker used to identify or categorize an item.
definition.example: She put a tag on the suitcase to identify it as hers.
